item.title: Changes to your Azure Information Protection configuration
item.description: Plan for change We are making some changes to your Azure Information Protection (AIP) configuration. Starting July 1, 2018, we will be enabling the protection features in Azure Information Protection to customers with the eligible Office 365 licenses. During the fall of 2017 MSFT announced some features for Microsoft 365 to help their customers to meet the requirements of GDPR. The original announcement is located here: New Microsoft 365 features to accelerate GDPR compliance and this post is about this small part of the announcement:
